content: tamarugo tamarugo is a tree that grows in the atacama desert of chile it is the only tree that can survive such dry conditions desert air can get quite chilly at times and it is nice to have something warm to wear especially in the mornings you might want to walk carefully around the tamarugo trees because they drop big wooden spikes on the ground maybe the stitch pattern will remind you of that copyright © annasaskia tamarugo materials 2 50 g balls of worsted weight yarn 50 g 95 m 104 yd needles 4 mm us size 6 dpns or circular needle 5 mm us size 8 dpns or circular needle gauge 24 sts and 28 row = 10 cm in k1 p1 ribbing with smaller needles size designed to fit head circumstances 54 - 57 cm 22 1/8 - 22 1/4 abbreviations st- stitch k - knit p - purl k2tog - knit 2 sts together k2togtbl - knit 2 sts together through the back loop sl7wyif - slip 7 sts with yarn in front sl5wyif - slip 5 sts with yarn in front sl3wyif - slip 3 sts with yarn in front copyright © annasaskia tamarugo pattern with smaller needles co 80 sts using your favorite stretchy cast on i used german twisted cast on join in the round being careful not to twist sts work k1 p1 ribbing until work measures 5 cm 2 change into larger needles start stitch pattern as follows round 1 k all sts round 2 sl7wyif k1 repeat to end of round round 3 k all sts round 4 k3 insert needle under loose strand and knit next st bringing it out under strand k4 repeat to end of round continue to work these 4 rounds until work measures 20 cm 8 ending with round 4 start decreasing as follows round 1 decrease round k1 k2togtbl k1 k2tog k2 repeat to end of round round 2 sl5wyif k1 repeat to end of round round 3 k all sts round 4 k2 insert needle under loose strand and knit next st bringing it out under strand k3 repeat to end of round round 5 decrease round k2togtbl k1 k2tog k1 repeat to end of round round 6 sl3wyif k1 repeat to end of round round 7 k all sts round 8 k1 insert needle under loose strand and knit next st bringing it out under strand k2 repeat to end of round round 9 k2tog repeat to end of round 20sts round 10 k2tog repeat to end of round 10 sts pull yarn through remaining sts wash block gently weave in ends copyright © annasaskia
